## **Financial Accounting Services for Health Canada's Inventory of Rapid Tests**

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Title (English)** | PASS - Financial Accounting Services for Health Canada's Inventory of Rapid Tests |

### **Contract Details**

| --- | --- |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | None |

### **Proposal Details**
This requirement is only open to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZQ-140002 who qualified under the Stream 6 – Financial and Accounting Services. Health Canada requires financial accounting services to execute all functions associated with inventory accounting of rapid tests remaining in the warehouse.

The Government of Canada is procuring rapid testing devices from international and national vendors. Procured rapid testing devices are shipped to Canada and stored in warehouses prior to being released and shipped across Canada. Health Canada requires financial accounting services to execute all functions associated with inventory accounting of rapid tests remaining in the warehouse. The proposed period of the contract is from the date of contract to March 31, 2024 inclusive.

### **Eligible Partners**
Only the following Supply Arrangement Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* A Hundred Answers Inc
* BDO Canada LLP
* Deloitte LLP
* Ernst & Young LLP
* KPMG LLP
* MNP LLP
* Niewe Technology and Consulting Ltd
* Orbis Risk Consulting Inc
* Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc
* Samson & Associes CPA/Consultation Inc
